representation_information.name: PDF (Portable Document Format), version 1.7, Base level (ISO 32000-1:2008)
representation_information.description: Developed by Adobe Systems Incorporated. Approved as ISO 32000-1:2008. A general document representation language. PDF represents formatted, page-oriented documents. Adobe documentation for version 1.7 is dated November 2006, and associated with Acrobat and Adobe Reader 8.

relation.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
